details.description: The room shakes violently, as it did during the Rending, and the spirits of dozens of dwarves make a mad dash for safety, their terror palpable.
details.disable: @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:18|name:Calm the Spirits|traits:unique,complex,haunt], @Check[type:intimidation|dc:18|name:Calm the Spirits|traits:unique,complex,haunt], or @Check[type:religion|dc:18|name:Calm the Spirits|traits:unique,complex,haunt] to calm the panicked spirits, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Wrestle Spirits into Order|traits:unique,complex,haunt] to wrestle them into a semblance of order. Two successful checks are required to deactivate the haunt, and each attempt requires two actions.
details.reset: Unless deactivated, the haunt deactivates 1 minute after all creatures leave the area but resets immediately thereafter. If deactivated, the haunt resets after 24 hours.
details.routine:
1 Phantom dwarves trample toward the exit, dealing [[/r {1d10+4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d10+4 bludgeoning damage} to each living creature in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|name:Trampled by Spirits|traits:complex,haunt,unique] save). On a critical failure, a creature is also knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

A creature that attempts to Stand after being inside the haunt's area must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check or else get knocked back down by the trampling spirits.

source.value: Pathfinder Society Scenario 2-19: Enter the Pallid Peak

description.value:
Trigger A living creature approaches within 10 feet of the lava

Effect The room rumbles and a blast of heat hits each creature in the area, followed by a surge of fear. The creatures must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:18] save, and the haunt rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fleeing]{Fleeing} for 1 round.
